metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1116 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.Description: Integer Overflow or Wraparound vulnerability in io_uring of Linux Kernelallows local attacker to cause memory corruption and escalate privileges toroot. This issue affects: Linux Kernel versions prior to 5.4.189; version5.4.24 and later versions.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
